title: Episode 79: Ft. Kreesha Turner
itunes:title: Episode 79: Ft. Kreesha Turner
description:
This week on Lip Service we have Canadian and Jamaican recording artist Kreesha Turner! The ladies, as usual, don't hold back and get her to discuss the ongoing rumor that Jamaican men don't go down on women. She explains why her culture considers it "bowing down". They also talk about the extremes of cheating and if faced with the issue which one would be worse: finding out your partner pays for sex or has emotional connections and other relationships. Angela Yee, Stephanie Santiago, and Gigi Maguire talk
